title: Patch Notes Thoughts?
body:
Is it still Morello's over Athene's?

And what do you guys think about the changes to the new jungle items?

replies.body: Well how about the changes to Devourer and Skirmisher's Sabre? Do you guys feel like you'll be changing some of your jungle builds?

I'm glad they're putting monsters a little closer together for AoE's. I can't seem to get every monster with Amumu's W sometimes, especially at red buff.


Although I'm really mad about the removal of the smite cooldown reduction. It's way too long already.
I would say overall Morellos is going to get picked up more but depending on who you are playing and laning against Athenes is still completely viable.

Too much nerf to jungle, already very little exp to force you to gank lanes even when you don't have to with less gold per camp. 

Apply for centerlink payment before going jungling.

> Too much nerf to jungle, already very little exp to force you to gank lanes even when you don't have to with less gold per camp. 
> 
> Apply for centerlink payment before going jungling.

huh? its not a nerf to the gold...
They made the minions give 10g less but made machete give you 10g for killing the large one (so its the same) and any upgraded machete gives you 20g (giving you an extra 10g you wouldnt have before).

Makes more sense now to let the jungler have his camps as it creates more gold for the team. Not that it matters in solo que, but it will for teams.
